arts.sum: Match of the Day 2 pundits Alan Shearer and David Moyes analyse how Manchester United capitalised on Everton's lack of end product in the final third.

arts.ttl: Man Utd 'far from perfect' in win over Everton - Amorim
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says his side's emphatic victory over Everton was "far from perfect" despite the one-sided scoreline.

arts.ttl: Man United fans think Ruben Amorim threw shade at former manager Erik ten Hag with comments about star after Everton thrashing
arts.sum: Manchester United supporters think Ruben Amorim may have made a subtle dig at former manager Erik ten Hag with one of his post-match comments on Sunday.

arts.ttl: 'It's just madness' - Dyche perplexed by Everton defending
arts.sum: Everton manager Sean Dyche says his side's defending for Manchester United's third goal was "madness" in their 4-0 loss at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Samuel Luckhurst Blown Away by Man Utd Star Who 'Tore Everton to Shreds'
arts.sum: Amad Diallo has burst into life for Manchester United this season and that has seen his non-inclusion last campaign questioned

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche refuses suggestion Everton collapsed at Manchester United
arts.sum: Everton manager Sean Dyche reacts after his side conceded four quick goals either side of half-time to lose 4-0 at Manchester United

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim responds to Man Utd v Everton
arts.sum: Also I think the three amazing games that Ruud [van Nistelrooy] was in charge of this team helped him a lot, Amad, and Amad is now helping me." So congratulations to the staff, great job.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim not getting carried away after Manchester United thrash Everton
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford and Joshua Zirkzee scored two goals apiece in a 4-0 triumph at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim insists Man United players still 'have a LONG way to go' despite statement 4-0 win over Everton... and picks out one star for praise after 'Ruud van Nistelrooy helped' him improve
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD: Despite braces for Marcus Rashford and Joshua Zirkzee, United's new head coach believes far more is to come.

arts.ttl: What Sean Dyche faced at full-time spoke volumes about Everton and where they are heading
arts.sum: Joe Thomas delivers a sobering verdict after Everton's 4-0 Premier League defeat at Manchester United
